name: ColdSide
description:
ColdSide is a psychological horror first-person game. It takes place in an abandoned underground laboratory that studied anomalous phenomena.
You play as a digger named Chris who decided to investigate this creepy place.
Features:
Constant tension from the unknown.
Atmospheric music and ambient by Mikko Tarmia (composer Amnesia and Soma)
Realistic graphics. The game’s been made with CryEngine V.
The video game was influenced by the SCP Foundation
